title: inverter_fault_low_solar_input_morning
summary: Inverter fault condition triggered shortly after morning startup.
description: Image documents inverter fault state indicated by red FAULT indicator and audible alert, occurring approximately 10 minutes after inverter power-on. Event is recorded under low solar input conditions.

asset_context.system_role: power management and conversion for farm operations

external_reference.note: External image reference provided for independent verification.
